# The `AMDGPUDAGToDAGISel` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu">AMDGPU</a> specific code to select <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu">AMDGPU</a> machine instructions for <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag">SelectionDAG</a> operations. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu">AMDGPU</a> specific code to select <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu">AMDGPU</a> machine instructions for <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag">SelectionDAG</a> operations.
